word_mean: 荧光：暴露于光时即有发光的特性，其发光的波长仅稍长于吸收光的波长。参见phosphorescence

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from fluorspar (which fluoresces), on the pattern of opalescence

entry.def: A fluorescent surface, substance, or colour has a very bright appearance when light is directed onto it, as if it is actually shining itself.
A fluorescent light shines with a very hard, bright light and is usually in the form of a long strip.

means.word_mean: 1. light emitted during absorption of radiation of some other (invisible) wavelength
